about_the_game:
Boarberry Farm is a 'farm defence' game, coined by our game developer Daniel as a fun mashup of the farming simulator and tower defence genres.

You harvest crops on the farm while fending off hungry boars who try to invade. Play solo or with a friend in our multiplayer setting.

Plant and water many tasty crops, armed with a bow and arrow to keep them safe from the pesky boars.

The goal of each day is to fulfil an ever-growing quota within the time limit.

It's a time management test - will you prioritize planting crops, fixing fences, or fending off boars?

Some main reference points for the game include the chaotic friendship destroyer cooking sim Overcooked 2 and the action roguelite farming sim Atomicrops.

Key Features:
Plant an array of delicious crops 🌶️
Play solo or with a friend 👫
Get into the farm feel with an awesome soundtrack! 🎶
Develop your aim and shoo away the hungry boars 🏹
Master the challenge of different difficulty levels 📈
Unlock exciting upgrades including stylish cooking pot helmets for added boar protection 🐗
Gain personal buffs by eating the crops yourself 💪
